episodes.synopsis: Suffering from writer's block after his wife's untimely death, Mike Noonan heads to his lakeside hideaway -- where he's haunted by a ghostly visitor.
episodes.title: Part I

episodes.synopsis: While trying to unravel the secrets of Dark Score Lake, Mike continues to be haunted by ghostly visits at his backwoods writing retreat.
episodes.title: Part II

video.title: Stephen King's Bag of Bones
video.synopsis: An author moves into his backwoods writing retreat, only to find himself confronting the vengeful ghost of a blues singer that still haunts the place.
